dmca.title: Alias Systems Objects to Resale of Licensed Software (#1)
dmca.body:
Alias  [Private], Toronto Ontario Canada [Private]
T [Private] F [Private] www.alias.com

Google, Inc.	Fax number: [Private]
[Private]
[Private]
Mountain View, CA [Private]

November 3. 2003

Dear Google Groups Support Team,
RE: User Support, DMCA Complaints

We have recently confirmed that certain Alias Systems software products have been advertised for purchase or distribution on certain Google Groups. The message is dated November 2, 2003 on the following newsgroups: comp.graphics.apps.alias, comp.graphics.packages.3dstudio, comp.graphics.api.inventor regarding the selling or distribution of Maya 5 Unlimited. The message id is as follows:

Message-ID: <2aff8059.0311021429.3leb2baa@posting.google.com>

Pursuant to
